channel.title: Massive Package of Resources for SCAR [Updated: November 18, 2007]
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Massive Package of Resources for SCAR v3.3[/size] [b][i]Collected & Compiled Together by Janilabo[/i][/b][/center]
[b]Introduction[/b] Yeees, as you can see... ..yet ANOTHER package collected and compiled together by me! This time there is MUCH more (USEFUL) stuff included, all very useless things are removed and also, stuffs are pretty well organized (so things are much easier to find from package). :D
[b]What is it?[/b] Massive Package of Resources for SCAR is a folder which contains stuff like: -SCAR versions (1.01 --> 3.12c) -Tutorials -Example scripts (which means: NO updated scripts for RuneScape) -Plugins -Includes -Some useful programs for script development -+ Other cool things!
[b]Other communities I have posted about this package to:[/b] [url=http://www.freddy1990.com/forums/index.php?topic=493.0]Freddy1990.com[/url] - Couple comments :) + thread is stickified. [url=http://forum.scar-scripts.com/showthread.php?t=1523]SCAR Scripts[/url] - Couple great comments + thread is stickified. [url=http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/massive-package-resources-t10041.html]SRL-Forums.com[/url] - A LOT of comments :) + thread is stickified. [url=http://sythe.org/showthread.php?t=215427]Sythe[/url] - Couple comments [url=http://www.fagex.net/showthread.php?t=40113]Fagex.net[/url] - No comments yet :/ [url=http://cruels.net/index.php?showtopic=5096]Cruels.net[/url] - 1 comment! [url=http://www.rsforums.org/showthread.php?t=3485]RSForums.org[/url] - Few comments :)
[b]NOTE:[/b] This package really is MASSIVE, therefore, it is required that you do have enough [u]free[/u] space in your computer (I recommend having [b]at least[/b] 2500 MB [2,5 GB free space) for it.
[b]Before you download...[/b] I had to upload the package in parts... ..as the zip was getting too huge, so I couldn't find a good file hosting site for it...
[b]This is how you get it[/b] [u]For noobs, explained noob-friendly (hopefully) and in steps:[/u] * [b]1.[/b] Download BOTH parts (Part 1 and Part 2) of it to your computer (download links are below this section). * [b]2.[/b] Extract it by using either one of the parts (Part 1 or Part 2)! * [b]3.[/b] Enjoy the package! Note: You might need software that can extract .zip packages.. Eg. [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]7-Zip[/url], which is FREE.
[b]DOWNLOAD[/b] Finally... :P
[u]MEGAUPLOAD[/u] [[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1EGMD3ZP]Part 1[/url]] [[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EQ0L1P79]Part 2[/url]]
[b]Be sure to check out CREDITS![/b] Because this is not 'my' package, I won't really take any credits about it... So, I attached a credits document, please check it out.
[b]Last comments[/b] Even though I don't take any credits of it, comments and critisism are of course welcome.. :)
I hope with this package more and more people will get into scripting with SCAR, because SCAR scripting actually is quite fun, effective and pretty easy (of course there are also alot hard things too). :P
Those who have downloaded Massive SCAR Package, you may want to remove it and compensate it with this, as this one is WAY better! ;)
P.S. If you find anykind of stuff in it that is made by you, but you don't see your name in credits document, then please write here... I will kindly update it (teh credits document) as soon as possible!
-Janilabo

item.title: Massive Package of Resources for SCAR [Updated: November 18, 2007]
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

I haven’t forgot you mate, don’t worry… ;D

I have been uploading parts for few days now, to WikiUpload (thanks to Ron!)… But hmmm, with my current connection it is just pretty slow job to do…

-6 parts uploaded, 3 to go (I am uploading version 3 of the Package, so new one). Should be done tomorrow (or later today)…

By the way, no, I am not uploading all the time em, just because I need my connection for gaming too… Heh. Each part takes like hour or two.

-Jani

Read full topic

item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

Yes, there is SCAR 1.13 version in every package.

But if you only need it (SCAR 1.13), you should check out Freddy’s SCAR archive, which has almost all previous versions of SCAR (which were released to public). 1 of em is SCAR 1.13.
